May 1, 2025:UnoMinda and the JV board approved a project report for electric vehicle (EV) powertrain products.

The company's board also approved the setting up of a greenfield plant for EV powertrain components in Khed City, Pune, with an estimated capital expenditure (capex) of â‚¹423 crore.

There were positive analyst reports regarding Uno Minda's Q4 FY25 performance, with strong growth expected in core segments like switches, castings, and seating, along with improving visibility in premium EV-led product lines.

However, some concerns were noted regarding the stock's valuation, as indicated by a high price-to-earnings (P/E) ratio and price-to-book (P/B) ratio.

The overall sentiment from Moneycontrol analysis at that time indicated a neutral outlook for the stock.
